alert.note: Alert for Greene; Monroe; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 6:53AM EDT until March 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Youngs Creek at Amity, White River at Spencer, Eel River at Bowling Green .Rain on Tuesday combined with rain overnight has led to flooding across several smaller streams. Flooding will begin along much of the White River in the coming days with flooding ongoing along Youngs Creek and the Eel River. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Spencer. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Gosport Road, also known as County Line Road in Owen County, begins to flood on north side of river. Romona Road west of Gosport begins to flood. Flooding of low agricultural land is noticeable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 15.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
